Package rpc.design

Class Summary
AttributePath Implementation of a Path for attributional variables.
ConditioningSet Conditioning Set is a design element that specifices a set of path variables to condition on.
Design A design object consists of the unit to test for dependence and the set of design elements that will control for various aspects of potential confounders.
DesignElement Abstract class that defines the type DesignElement used as components for designs.
Path The abstract path class stores the necessary information and basic methods for relational variables.
StructurePath Implementation of a Path for structural variables (e.g., cardinality or existence of relationships).
Unit The unit class consists of a pair of treatment and outcome paths with a common base item.
 

Enum Summary
Cardinality Enumeration of possible cardinalities.
